price: Kuma Muka aika iskõki mãsu barbarar jũna sa'an nan Muka saukar da ruwa daga sama, sa'an nan Muka shãyar da ku shi, kuma ba ku zama mãsu taskacẽwa a gare shi ba.
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلرِّيَٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِخَٰزِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnā al-riyāḥa lawāqiḥa fa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan fa-asqaynākumūhu wamā antum lahu bikhāzinīna
translations: and We gave it to you to drink
